plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fantasy, as many of the movies listed are fantasy or have fantasy elements. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be adventure, as many of the movies listed are adventure stories. The user's favourite kind of musical score is likely to be epic, as many of the movies listed have epic musical scores. The user's favourite mood for the musical score is likely to be uplifting, as many of the movies listed have uplifting musical scores. The user's favourite setting is likely to be a fictional world, as many of the movies listed are set in fictional worlds. The user's favourite visual style is likely to be colourful, as many of the movies listed are colourful. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be humorous, as many of the movies listed are humorous. The user's favourite runtime is likely to be between 90 and 120 minutes, as many of the movies listed have runtimes within this range. The user's favourite themes are likely to be adventure, fantasy, and humour.
